articles.author: Max Mathews
articles.title: World Cup: Lionel Messi equals German icon Lothar Matthaus' all-time appearance record - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Argentina captain lined up in attack as the South American side face Croatia in the Qatar World Cup semi-final on Tuesday evening, drawing him level with Matthaus on 25 World Cup appearances.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has gone level with Germany legend Lothar Matthaus' all-time World Cup appearance record.

articles.title: The two days that could determine the fate of the global economy - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The US Federal Reserve Board meets on Wednesday, a day after the latest US inflation data. Its decision will shape the economic outlook for America and the rest of the world.
articles.content:
The markets see things differently and are pricing in a peak rate of 5 per cent around May or June next year, with US rates falling about 50 basis points in the second half of the year.

articles.title: American Diabetes Association release new disease management standards - USA TODAY
